name: MTLCounterSamplingPoint
desc: Options for different times when you can sample GPU counters.

items.name: case atBlitBoundary
items.desc: Counter sampling is allowed between blit commands in a blit pass.

items.name: case atDispatchBoundary
items.desc: Counter sampling is allowed between kernel dispatches in a compute pass.

items.name: case atDrawBoundary
items.desc: Counter sampling is allowed between draw commands in a render pass.
